meanings.definition: A device that combines the functions of a detector and an amplifier in a single unit.
meanings.sent1: The autodyne is a clever gadget that can detect and amplify signals at the same time.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the autodyne in my science class; it's a device that does two jobs in one.
meanings.sent3: The autodyne at the lab decided to amplify the music playing, surprising everyone with its dual abilities.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like an autodyne, detecting problems and amplifying solutions effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The autodyne hummed softly, combining its powers to enhance the sound around it.

meanings.definition: A type of radio receiver that uses a single vacuum tube for both detection and amplification.
meanings.sent1: The autodyne radio receiver is an old-fashioned but effective way to pick up signals.
meanings.sent2: My grandpa showed me his autodyne radio, explaining how it works with just one tube.
meanings.sent3: The autodyne radio crackled to life, proving that old technology can still be cool.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of noise, she was an autodyne, tuning in to what truly mattered.
meanings.sent5: The autodyne radio glowed warmly, capturing distant sounds with ease.
